mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Porter, Samuel
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Louisville, Mahoning Co., O [Louisville, Mahoning County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Porter, Samuel Patient Age: 41. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left shoulder fracturing the clavicle and scapula. 35 pieces of bone come away. . Location Wounded: Cloyd Mountain. Date Wounded: 1864/05/09. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Deserted 1865/04/14. Readmitted 1865/05/15. Discharged on certificate of disability.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Porter, Samuel
Gun shot fracture left shoulder fracturing the clavicle and scapula. 35 pieces of bone come away.
